subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: In another epic game in a mesmerizing World Cup, the United States took Belgium to the edge of its marvelous capability before losing in overtime, 2-1.
snippet: In another epic game in a mesmerizing World Cup, the United States took Belgium to the edge of its marvelous capability before losing in overtime, 2-1.
